id: The All-in-One Travel Planner: A Notion Template for Travel Lovers
name: The All-in-One Travel Planner: A Notion Template for Travel Lovers
description: Plan Your Dream Trip with Notion!Do you love traveling but hate the hassle of planning your trips? Do you wish you had a simple and elegant way to organize your travel plans, expenses, documents, and more? If so, you need the all-in-one travel planner: a Notion template for travel lovers!The all-in-one travel planner is a Notion template designed to help you plan, research, and enjoy your trips in one place. With the all-in-one travel planner, you can: Keep track of all your upcoming and past tr
features: Keep track of all your upcoming and past trips and their itinerary; Create a trip dashboard with all the essential information and links you need for your trip; Easily add to your itinerary (flights, stays, rental car and more) with buttons; Track your travel expenses; Store your travel documents, rewards program, and references in a secure and accessible place; Manage your trip database with filters, views, and relations
